description.thought: The next step is to add the Pro Stand to the configuration.
description.action: On the Pro Display XDR purchase configuration page, clicking on the 'Pro Stand' option to add it to the configuration. This is necessary to include all accessories with the display.

Pro StandHeight, tilt, rotation — it’s completely adjustable. Stable without taking up much space. And easy to move between landscape and portrait, making it perfect for any type of work.Is Pro Stand right for you?No, thanksPro Stand$899.00or
